title: Intertwined
description: “I come before you. You will leave after me. I am someone you must never forget.” Cali, a school-oriented girl, was someone who never really had dreams. When she moved to her dorm at Arizona State University, she has been getting recurring terrible dreams – nightmares. The worst thing was that she can actually remember them, and it all felt vivid and real.Just when she thought she already had enough stress on her first few weeks in college, her life turned upside down when she met a loner and an aloof guy, Hayden. It was uncanny because she felt attached to the mysterious guy whom she had just met. There was a strong familiarity between them.It all got more complicated when Cali found out that she had a strange ability, and that some group of people was chasing her, wanting her dead.What is this ability that Cali discovered about herself? What is the connection she and Hayden have? Who are these group of people who want her dead, and why? This sci-fi romance story full of twists will surely keep you on the edge of your seats! Grab your own copy now!
author: T.M. Mendes
